and fairy too, why the hell not?
actually, upgrade the entire typing system to gen 6
-demzo

Steel:
Magnemite/magneton = electric/steel

Dark
Bite = dark

Fairy
clefairy/clefable = fairy
jiggly/wiggly = normal/fairy
mr. mime = psychic/fairy

also alter these moves:
gust to flying			done
karate chop to fighting	done
sand attack to ground	done

+ rewrite gen6 weak/resist/immune

Type IDNs:
11-	Steel
12-	Dark
13-	Fairy
